title: Baby Empress - Novel Updates
tags: Abandoned Children   Adapted to Manhwa   Adopted Protagonist   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Child Abuse   Child Protagonist   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Nobles   Orphans   Overprotective Siblings   Prophecies   Royalty   Single Parent   Sister Complex   Strong Love Interests
author: Yusoy   유소이
description:
The child of a prophecy is born to save the world.

“I need to get married to save people…? I’ll do the marriage!”

The emperor is a young and innocent boy. But…

“I can’t give you my daughter! She will not be becoming empress.”

My father interfered with my marriage!

“Is my sister just a toy to you?”

And my brother too!

Will I be able to save the world?>
